QuestData.Title: The Talon King
QuestData.Description:
<As Reshad begins reciting a tale of Terokk's glory days, your eyes fall to the twin swords at the effigy's belt.
They had seemed so plain in Skettis, but now they thrum with power, as if reacting to the scrollkeeper's words.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Effigy of Terokk to re-live Terokk's battle with the Bloodmane. Slay $1oa Bloodmane Shortfangs, $2oa Mature Bloodmane saberon, and Pridelord Karash.
QuestData.RewardText: That was but one of many such tales.$B$BNo arakkoa living or dead has ever compared to the Talon King.
